title: Ticket #1566: Inefficient remote submissions of queue X, repeated calls to schedd
description:
condor_submit -name my_remote_schedd <submit with queue X=1000>

The protocol for a remote submission is inefficient where it repeatedly sets the attributes for EnteredCurrentStatus, JobStatus for each cluster.proc (e.g., 2x1000). Over WAN/VPN links this incurs noticeable latency.
creator: pmackinn
